This page is built to explore some of the settings in Smooth Scrollbar, a JavaScript plugin you can find more information about here.

The main page scroll features the default settings. There's a box down at the bottom of the page with some custom settings.

Be careful

You should initialize a scrollbar with a limited width and height. If the container element is natively scrollable before initializing the Scrollbar, it means you are on the correct way.

Some different scroll options are used on the container below
